member.name: T:Minimizer.Connect
member.summary: The object for implementing an Add-in.

member.name: M:Minimizer.Connect.#ctor
member.summary: Implements the constructor for the Add-in object. Place your initialization code within this method.

member.name: M:Minimizer.Connect.OnConnection(System.Object,Extensibility.ext_ConnectMode,System.Object,System.Array@)
member.summary: Implements the OnConnection method of the IDTExtensibility2 interface. Receives notification that the Add-in is being loaded.

member.name: M:Minimizer.Connect.OnDisconnection(Extensibility.ext_DisconnectMode,System.Array@)
member.summary: Implements the OnDisconnection method of the IDTExtensibility2 interface. Receives notification that the Add-in is being unloaded.

member.name: M:Minimizer.Connect.OnAddInsUpdate(System.Array@)
member.summary: Implements the OnAddInsUpdate method of the IDTExtensibility2 interface. Receives notification when the collection of Add-ins has changed.

member.name: M:Minimizer.Connect.OnStartupComplete(System.Array@)
member.summary: Implements the OnStartupComplete method of the IDTExtensibility2 interface. Receives notification that the host application has completed loading.

member.name: M:Minimizer.Connect.OnBeginShutdown(System.Array@)
member.summary: Implements the OnBeginShutdown method of the IDTExtensibility2 interface. Receives notification that the host application is being unloaded.

member.name: M:Minimizer.Connect.QueryStatus(System.String,EnvDTE.vsCommandStatusTextWanted,EnvDTE.vsCommandStatus@,System.Object@)
member.summary: Implements the QueryStatus method of the IDTCommandTarget interface. This is called when the command's availability is updated

member.name: M:Minimizer.Connect.Exec(System.String,EnvDTE.vsCommandExecOption,System.Object@,System.Object@,System.Boolean@)
member.summary: Implements the Exec method of the IDTCommandTarget interface. This is called when the command is invoked.
